languages.text: "Ткачам не помешали бы уроки такта, но разве пристало мне жаловаться на дурное обращение? Не в первый и, видит Великий, не в последний раз".
"The spinners could use a lesson in courtesy, but should I really complain of mistreatment? It was not the first time, and, by the Exalted One, it will not be the last."
languages.original_text: "Ткачам не помешали бы уроки такта, но разве пристало мне жаловаться на дурное обращение? Не в первый и, видит Великий, не в последний раз".

traits.locale_text: "The spinners could use a lesson in courtesy, but should I complain of mistreatment? It was not the first time, and by the Exalted One, it will not be the last."

"The spinners could use a lesson in courtesy, but should I really complain of mistreatment? It was not the first time, and, by the Exalted One, it will not be the last."

"The spinners could use a lesson in courtesy, but should I really complain of mistreatment? It was not the first time, and, by the Exalted One, it will not be the last."

languages.text: «A los tejedores no les iría mal una lección de cortesía, pero tampoco es justo que me queje de su trato. No ha sido la primera vez y sabe el Exaltado que tampoco será la última».
languages.original_text: "The spinners could use a lesson in courtesy, but should I really complain of mistreatment? It was not the first time, and, by the Exalted One, it will not be the last."

traits.locale_text: «A los tejedores no les iría mal una lección de cortesía, pero tampoco es justo que me queje de su trato. No ha sido la primera vez y sabe el Exaltado que tampoco será la última».

languages.text: スピナーは礼儀について学ぶべきですが、本当に虐待について苦情を言う必要がありますか？これは初めてではありませんし、エグザルテッド・ワンによってはこれが最後ではないでしょう」
languages.original_text: "The spinners could use a lesson in courtesy, but should I really complain of mistreatment? It was not the first time, and, by the Exalted One, it will not be the last."

traits.locale_text: スピナーは礼儀について学ぶべきですが、本当に虐待について苦情を言う必要がありますか？これは初めてではありませんし、エグザルテッド・ワンによってはこれが最後ではないでしょう」

languages.text: “织网者真该好好学学礼仪，不过，我真的要抱怨他们粗鲁的举止吗？这已经不是第一次了，而且我敢向至高无上的神皇发誓，这也绝对不会是最后一次。”
languages.original_text: "The spinners could use a lesson in courtesy, but should I really complain of mistreatment? It was not the first time, and, by the Exalted One, it will not be the last."

traits.locale_text: “织网者真该好好学学礼仪，不过，我真的要抱怨他们粗鲁的举止吗？这已经不是第一次了，而且我敢向至高无上的神皇发誓，这也绝对不会是最后一次。”

languages.text: "Die Spinner könnten eine Lektion in Höflichkeit vertragen, aber sollte ich mich wirklich wegen ihres Fehlverhaltens beschweren? Es war nicht das erste Mal, und beim Erhabenen, es wird auch nicht das letzte Mal bleiben."
languages.original_text: "The spinners could use a lesson in courtesy, but should I really complain of mistreatment? It was not the first time, and, by the Exalted One, it will not be the last."

traits.locale_text: "Die Spinner könnten eine Lektion in Höflichkeit vertragen, aber sollte ich mich wirklich wegen ihres Fehlverhaltens beschweren? Es war nicht das erste Mal, und beim Erhabenen, es wird auch nicht das letzte Mal bleiben."

languages.text: « Les tisseurs ont bien besoin d'une leçon de courtoisie, mais puis-je vraiment me plaindre d'avoir été maltraitée ? Ce n'est pas la première fois que ça m'arrive et, l'Exalté m'en est témoin, ce ne sera sûrement pas la dernière. »
languages.original_text: "The spinners could use a lesson in courtesy, but should I really complain of mistreatment? It was not the first time, and, by the Exalted One, it will not be the last."

traits.locale_text: « Les tisseurs ont bien besoin d'une leçon de courtoisie, mais puis-je vraiment me plaindre d'avoir été maltraitée ? Ce n'est pas la première fois que ça m'arrive et, l'Exalté m'en est témoin, ce ne sera sûrement pas la dernière. »

languages.text: "Dokurlar, nezaket namına bir şeyler öğrense fena olmaz. Peki bu kötü muameleden gerçekten şikâyet etmeli miyim? Yani sonuçta ilk defa yaşanmadı. Görkemli adına, son olacağını da sanmıyorum."
languages.original_text: "The spinners could use a lesson in courtesy, but should I really complain of mistreatment? It was not the first time, and, by the Exalted One, it will not be the last."
